PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-10472016-11-25,  ,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
Canadian Environmental Assessment Act
SubjectNational Energy Board - Northern Gateway Pipelines Limited Partnership
PrecisOrder (1) deciding that taking into account the implementation of mitigation measures that the Governor in Council considers appropriate, the Project is likely to cause significant adverse environmental effects; (2) deciding that the significant adverse environmental effects referred to are not justified in the circumstances; and (3) directing the National Energy Board to dismiss NORTHERN GATEWAY PIPELINES LIMITED PARTNERSHIP's application for a certificate, in respect of the construction and operation of a terminal at Kitimat, British Columbia and two parallel pipelines between Bruderheim, Alberta and Kitimat.
AttachmentsAttachment
